attributes.action: Give Youth Serivces Across The Country More Funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Knife Crime, Gun Crime and Gang Culture has seeped into British Society, more and more young people are dying, normally at the hands of other Young People. What we need is better funded Youth Services, Give Youth Workers the chance to get hold of Young People before they turn to crime, give Youth Workers more power to help educate young people, and help youth workers to help young people get accredited qualifications

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
